welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lawang Bato, the charming city known for its stunning landscapes and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in our vibrant culture and breathtaking scenery. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our beautiful city."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal, serving both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Formerly known as the Domestic Terminal, it now serves as the hub for domestic flights of Philippine Airlines and its subsidiaries.

wifi.note: Available in all terminals, with a time limit of 2 hours per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport.
